name: Salvaged (itch)
description:
A small personal project about flying a vulnerable spacecraft through an increasingly cluttered asteroid field to reach the safety of a support hangar. (Warning I didn't get round to implementing volume so make sure to turn application/system volume down)

WASD to move left, right, up and down

Q to fire missiles

R to equip/unequip repair module

Mouse to direct repair module (a bit janky, but focus was on gyroscope controls + time constraint)

E to repair in direction module is pointing

There is a controller option, however, this is not for a gamepad, it was built around an arduino system for a uni project. By default the controller should be off, however the gyroscope controls are used through the mouse. The kb/m controls were not the primary focus so they are not as polished and small translations may be missing, however controller functionality works as desired.

To replicate you can set up:

Potentiometers on Analog ports 1 & 2

Buttons on Digital ports 6 and 4

Gyroscope on Analog 4 and 5
